      8 #include "src/codesearch.h"
      9 #include "src/chunk.h"
     10 #include "src/chunk_allocator.h"
     11 #include "src/content.h"
     12 #include "src/dump_load.h"
     13 #include "src/lib/debug.h"
     14 
     15 #include <map>
     16 #include <string>
     17 #include <memory>
     18 
     19 #include <sys/fcntl.h>
     20 #include <sys/mman.h>
     21 #include <sys/stat.h>
     22 #include <unistd.h>
     23 #include <errno.h>
     24 #include <string.h>
     25 
     26 #include "google/protobuf/util/json_util.h"
     27 
     28 class codesearch_index {
     29 public:
     30     codesearch_index(code_searcher *cs, string path) :
     31         cs_(cs),
     32         stream_(path.c_str(), ios::out | ios::trunc),
     33         hdr_() {
     34         assert(!stream_.fail());
     35         fd_ = open(path.c_str(), O_RDWR|O_APPEND);
     36         if (fd_ == -1) {
     37             string message = "Cannot open " + path;
     38             perror(message.c_str());
     39             exit(1);
     40         }
     41 
     42         hdr_.magic      = kIndexMagic;
     43         hdr_.version    = kIndexVersion;
     44         hdr_.chunk_size = cs->alloc_->chunk_size();
     45     }
     46 
     47     ~codesearch_index() {
     48         close(fd_);
     49     }
     50 
     51     void dump();
     52 protected:
     53     void dump_chunk_data();
     54     void dump_metadata();
     55     void dump_file(map<const indexed_tree*, int>& ids, indexed_file *sf);
     56     void dump_chunk_file(chunk_file *cf);
     57     void dump_chunk_files(chunk *, chunk_header *);
     58     void dump_chunk_data(chunk *);
     59     void dump_content_data();
     60     void dump_filename_index();
     61 
     62     void alignp(uint32_t align) {
     63         streampos pos = stream_.tellp();
     64         stream_.seekp((size_t(pos) + align - 1) & ~(align - 1));
     65     }
     66 
     67     template<class T>
     68     void dump(T *t) {
     69         stream_.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(t), sizeof *t);
     70     }
     71 
     72     void dump_int32(uint32_t i) {
     73         dump(&i);
     74     }
     75 
     76     void dump_string(const string &str) {
     77         dump_int32(str.size());
     78         stream_.write(str.c_str(), str.size());
     79     }
     80 
     81     code_searcher *cs_;
     82     std::fstream stream_;
     83     int fd_;
     84 
     85     uint8_t *map_;
     86     uint8_t *p_;
     87 
     88     index_header hdr_;
     89     vector<chunk_header> chunks_;
     90     vector<content_chunk_header> content_;
     91 
     92     friend class dump_allocator;
     93 };
     94 
     95 class dump_allocator : public chunk_allocator {
     96 private:
     97     pair<off_t, uint8_t *> alloc_mmap(size_t len) {
     98         void *buf;
     99 
    100         if (!index_.get()) {
    101             index_.reset(new codesearch_index(cs_, path_.c_str()));
    102             index_->dump(&index_->hdr_);
    103             index_->alignp(kPageSize);
    104         }
    105 
    106         off_t off = index_->stream_.tellp();
    107         int err = ftruncate(index_->fd_, off + len);
    108         if (err != 0) {
    109             die("ftruncate");
    110         }
    111         buf = mmap(NULL, len, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED,
    112                    index_->fd_, off);
    113         assert(buf != MAP_FAILED);
    114         index_->stream_.seekp(len, ios::cur);
    115         return make_pair(off, static_cast<uint8_t*>(buf));
    116     }
    117 
    118 public:
    119     dump_allocator(code_searcher *cs, const char *path)
    120         : cs_(cs), path_(path), index_() {
    121     }
    122 
    123     virtual chunk *alloc_chunk() {
    124         auto alloc = alloc_mmap((1 + sizeof(uint32_t)) * chunk_size_);
    125 
    126         chunk_header chdr = {
    127             uint64_t(alloc.first)
    128         };
    129         index_->chunks_.push_back(chdr);
    130 
    131         return new chunk(static_cast<unsigned char*>(alloc.second),
    132                          reinterpret_cast<uint32_t*>
    133                          (static_cast<unsigned char*>(alloc.second) + chunk_size_));
    134     }
    135 
    136     virtual buffer alloc_content_chunk() {
    137         auto alloc = alloc_mmap(kContentChunkSize);
    138         buffer b = {
    139             alloc.second, alloc.second + kContentChunkSize
    140         };
    141         content_chunk_header hdr = {
    142             uint64_t(alloc.first)
    143             /* .size will be calculated in finalize */
    144         };
    145         index_->content_.push_back(hdr);
    146         return b;
    147     }
    148 
    149     virtual void finalize() {
    150         chunk_allocator::finalize();
    151         auto cit = index_->content_.begin();
    152         for (auto ait = begin_content();
    153              ait != end_content(); ++ait, ++cit) {
    154             cit->size = ait->end - ait->data;
    155         }
    156         index_->dump_metadata();
    157         index_->dump_filename_index();
    158         index_->stream_.seekp(0);
    159         index_->dump(&index_->hdr_);
    160         index_->stream_.close();
    161     }
    162 
    163     virtual void free_chunk(chunk *chunk) {
    164         munmap(chunk->data, 5*chunk_size_);
    165         delete chunk;
    166     }
    167 protected:
    168     code_searcher *cs_;
    169     std::string path_;
    170     unique_ptr<codesearch_index> index_;
    171     map<void *, off_t> alloc_map_;
    172     vector<off_t> content_;
    173 
    174 };
    175 
    176 class load_allocator : public chunk_allocator {
    177 public:
    178     load_allocator(code_searcher *cs, const string& path);
    179 
    180     ~load_allocator() {
    181         close(fd_);
    182         munmap(map_, map_size_);
    183     }
    184 
    185     virtual chunk *alloc_chunk();
    186     virtual buffer alloc_content_chunk() {
    187         die("load_allocator::alloc_content_chunk");
    188     }
    189 
    190     virtual void free_chunk(chunk *chunk) {
    191         delete chunk;
    192     }
    193 
    194     virtual void drop_caches() {
    195         for (auto it = begin(); it != end(); ++it) {
    196             madvise((*it)->data, (*it)->size, MADV_DONTNEED);
    197             madvise((*it)->suffixes, (*it)->size * sizeof(*(*it)->suffixes), MADV_DONTNEED);
    198         }
    199 #ifdef POSIX_FADV_DONTNEED
    200         posix_fadvise(fd_, hdr_->chunks_off,
    201                       chunks_.size() * chunk_size_ * (1 + sizeof(uint32_t)),
    202                       POSIX_FADV_DONTNEED);
    203 #endif
    204     }
    205 
    206     void load(code_searcher *cs);
    207 protected:
    208     template <class T>
    209     T *consume() {
    210         T *out = reinterpret_cast<T*>(p_);
    211         p_ += sizeof(T);
    212         return out;
    213     }
    214 
    215     template <class T>
    216     T *ptr(uint64_t off) {
    217         assert(off < map_size_);
    218         return reinterpret_cast<T*>(static_cast<uint8_t*>(map_) + off);
    219     }
    220 
    221     void seekg(off_t off) {
    222         p_ = static_cast<uint8_t*>(map_) + off;
    223     }
    224 
    225     std::unique_ptr<indexed_file> load_file(code_searcher *cs);
    226     void load_chunk(code_searcher *);
    227 
    228     uint32_t load_int32() {
    229         return *(consume<uint32_t>());
    230     }
    231 
    232     string load_string() {
    233         uint32_t len = load_int32();
    234         uint8_t *buf = p_;
    235         p_ += len;
    236         return string(reinterpret_cast<char*>(buf), len);
    237     }
    238 
    239     int fd_;
    240     void *map_;
    241     size_t map_size_;
    242     uint8_t *p_;
    243 
    244     index_header *hdr_;
    245     chunk_header *chunks_hdr_;
    246     chunk_header *next_chunk_;
    247 };
    248 
    249 std::unique_ptr<chunk_allocator> make_dump_allocator(code_searcher *search, const string& path) {
    250     return std::make_unique<dump_allocator>(search, path.c_str());
    251 }
    252 
    253 void codesearch_index::dump_file(map<const indexed_tree*, int>& ids, indexed_file *sf) {
    254     dump_int32(ids[sf->tree]);
    255     dump_string(sf->path);
    256 }
    257 
    258 void codesearch_index::dump_chunk_file(chunk_file *cf) {
    259     dump_int32(cf->files.size());
    260     for (list<indexed_file*>::iterator it = cf->files.begin();
    261          it != cf->files.end(); ++it)
    262         dump_int32((*it)->no);
    263 
    264     dump_int32(cf->left);
    265     dump_int32(cf->right);
    266 }
    267 
    268 void codesearch_index::dump_chunk_files(chunk *chunk, chunk_header *hdr) {
    269     hdr->files_off = stream_.tellp();
    270     hdr->nfiles = chunk->files.size();
    271     hdr->size = chunk->size;
    272 
    273     for (vector<chunk_file>::iterator it = chunk->files.begin();
    274          it != chunk->files.end(); it ++)
    275         dump_chunk_file(&(*it));
    276 }
    277 
    278 void codesearch_index::dump_chunk_data(chunk *chunk) {
    279     alignp(kPageSize);
    280     size_t off = stream_.tellp();
    281 
    282     chunk_header chdr;
    283     chdr.data_off = off;
    284     chdr.size = chunk->size;
    285     chunks_.push_back(chdr);
    286 
    287     int err = ftruncate(fd_, off + 5 * hdr_.chunk_size);
    288     if (err != 0) {
    289         die("ftruncate");
    290     }
    291     stream_.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(chunk->data), hdr_.chunk_size);
    292     stream_.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(chunk->suffixes),
    293                   sizeof(uint32_t) * chunk->size);
    294     stream_.seekp(off + 5 * hdr_.chunk_size);
    295 }
    296 
    297 void codesearch_index::dump_metadata() {
    298     hdr_.ntrees   = cs_->trees_.size();
    299     hdr_.nfiles   = cs_->files_.size();
    300     hdr_.nchunks  = cs_->alloc_->size();
    301     hdr_.ncontent = content_.size();
    302 
    303     hdr_.name_off = stream_.tellp();
    304     dump_string(cs_->name());
    305 
    306     map<const indexed_tree*, int> tree_ids;
    307 
    308     hdr_.refs_off = stream_.tellp();
    309     for (auto it = cs_->trees_.begin();
    310          it != cs_->trees_.end(); ++it) {
    311         dump_string((*it)->name);
    312         dump_string((*it)->version);
    313         string metadata;
    314         auto st = google::protobuf::util::MessageToJsonString((*it)->metadata, &metadata);
    315         if (!st.ok()) {
    316             die("protobuf: %s", st.ToString().c_str());
    317         }
    318         dump_string(metadata);
    319         tree_ids[it->get()] = it - cs_->trees_.begin();
    320     }
    321     hdr_.files_off = stream_.tellp();
    322     for (auto it = cs_->files_.begin();
    323          it != cs_->files_.end(); ++it)
    324         dump_file(tree_ids, it->get());
    325 
    326     auto hdr = chunks_.begin();
    327     for (auto it = cs_->alloc_->begin();
    328          it != cs_->alloc_->end(); ++it, ++hdr) {
    329         assert(hdr != chunks_.end());
    330         dump_chunk_files(*it, &(*hdr));
    331     }
    332 
    333     hdr_.chunks_off = stream_.tellp();
    334     for (auto it = chunks_.begin(); it != chunks_.end(); ++it)
    335         dump(&*it);
    336 
    337     hdr_.content_off = stream_.tellp();
    338     for (auto it = content_.begin(); it != content_.end(); ++it)
    339         dump(&*it);
    340 }
    341 
    342 void codesearch_index::dump_chunk_data() {
    343     alignp(kPageSize);
    344     for (auto it = cs_->alloc_->begin();
    345          it != cs_->alloc_->end(); ++it) {
    346         dump_chunk_data(*it);
    347     }
    348 }
    349 
    350 void codesearch_index::dump_content_data() {
    351     alignp(kPageSize);
    352     for (auto it = cs_->alloc_->begin_content();
    353          it != cs_->alloc_->end_content(); ++it) {
    354         off_t off = stream_.tellp();
    355         stream_.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(it->data), it->end - it->data);
    356         content_.push_back((content_chunk_header) {
    357                 uint64_t(off),
    358                 uint32_t(it->end - it->data)
    359             });
    360     }
    361 }
    362 
    363 void codesearch_index::dump_filename_index() {
    364     hdr_.nfiledata = cs_->filename_data_.size();
    365 
    366     hdr_.filedata_off = stream_.tellp();
    367     for (auto it = cs_->filename_data_.begin();
    368          it != cs_->filename_data_.end(); ++it) {
    369         dump(&*it);
    370     }
    371 
    372     hdr_.filesuffixes_off = stream_.tellp();
    373     for (auto it = cs_->filename_suffixes_.begin();
    374          it != cs_->filename_suffixes_.end(); ++it) {
    375         dump_int32(*it);
    376     }
    377 
    378     hdr_.filepos_off = stream_.tellp();
    379     for (auto it = cs_->filename_positions_.begin();
    380          it != cs_->filename_positions_.end(); ++it) {
    381         dump(&it->first);
    382         // The indexed_file associated with this filename position is already
    383         // populated into the dump file via dump_metadata at this point; it need
    384         // not be re-written.
    385     }
    386 }
    387 
    388 void codesearch_index::dump() {
    389     assert(cs_->finalized_);
    390 
    391     dump(&hdr_);
    392 
    393     dump_chunk_data();
    394     dump_content_data();
    395     dump_metadata();
    396     dump_filename_index();
    397 
    398     stream_.seekp(0);
    399     dump(&hdr_);
    400 }
    401 
    402 load_allocator::load_allocator(code_searcher *cs, const string& path) {
    403     fd_ = open(path.c_str(), O_RDONLY);
    404     if (fd_ == -1) {
    405         string message = "Cannot open " + path;
    406         perror(message.c_str());
    407         exit(1);
    408     }
    409     struct stat st;
    410     int err = fstat(fd_, &st);
    411     if (err != 0) {
    412         die("Cannot stat: '%s': %s\n", path.c_str(), strerror(errno));
    413     }
    414     map_size_ = st.st_size;
    415     map_ = mmap(NULL, map_size_, PROT_READ, MAP_SHARED,
    416                 fd_, 0);
    417     assert(map_ != MAP_FAILED);
    418     p_ = static_cast<unsigned char*>(map_);
    419 
    420     hdr_ = consume<index_header>();
    421     set_chunk_size(hdr_->chunk_size);
    422     chunks_hdr_ = next_chunk_ = ptr<chunk_header>(hdr_->chunks_off);
    423 
    424     p_ = ptr<unsigned char>(hdr_->name_off);
    425     cs->set_name(load_string());
    426 }
    427 
    428 
    429 chunk *load_allocator::alloc_chunk() {
    430     unsigned char *data = ptr<unsigned char>(next_chunk_->data_off);
    431     uint32_t *indexes = reinterpret_cast<uint32_t*>(data + chunk_size_);
    432 
    433     return new chunk(data, indexes);
    434 }
    435 
    436 unique_ptr<indexed_file> load_allocator::load_file(code_searcher *cs) {
    437     auto sf = std::make_unique<indexed_file>();
    438     sf->tree = cs->trees_[load_int32()].get();
    439     sf->path = load_string();
    440     sf->no = cs->files_.size();
    441     return sf;
    442 }
    443 
    444 void load_allocator::load_chunk(code_searcher *cs) {
    445     skip_chunk();
    446     chunk* chunk = current_chunk();
    447 
    448     assert(next_chunk_->size <= hdr_->chunk_size);
    449     chunk->size = next_chunk_->size;
    450 
    451     p_ = ptr<unsigned char>(next_chunk_->files_off);
    452 
    453     for (int i = 0; i < next_chunk_->nfiles; i++) {
    454         chunk->files.push_back(chunk_file());
    455         chunk_file &cf = chunk->files.back();
    456         uint32_t nfiles = load_int32();
    457         for (int j = 0; j < nfiles; j++)
    458             cf.files.push_back(cs->files_[load_int32()].get());
    459         cf.left  = load_int32();
    460         cf.right = load_int32();
    461     }
    462     chunk->build_tree_names();
    463     chunk->build_tree();
    464     ++next_chunk_;
    465 }
    466 
    467 void load_allocator::load(code_searcher *cs) {
    468     assert(!cs->finalized_);
    469     assert(!cs->trees_.size());
    470 
    471     assert(hdr_->magic == kIndexMagic);
    472     assert(hdr_->version == kIndexVersion);
    473     assert(hdr_->chunks_off);
    474 
    475     set_chunk_size(hdr_->chunk_size);
    476 
    477     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->refs_off);
    478     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->ntrees; i++) {
    479         auto tree = std::make_unique<indexed_tree>();
    480         tree->name = load_string();
    481         tree->version = load_string();
    482         string metadata = load_string();
    483         if (metadata.size() != 0) {
    484             auto status = google::protobuf::util::JsonStringToMessage(metadata, &tree->metadata, google::protobuf::util::JsonParseOptions());
    485             if (!status.ok()) {
    486                 die("parse metadata: %s", status.ToString().c_str());
    487             }
    488         }
    489 
    490         cs->trees_.push_back(move(tree));
    491     }
    492 
    493     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->files_off);
    494     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->nfiles; i++) {
    495         cs->files_.push_back(load_file(cs));
    496     }
    497 
    498     assert(!current_);
    499     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->nchunks; i++) {
    500         load_chunk(cs);
    501     }
    502 
    503     content_chunk_header *chdr = ptr<content_chunk_header>(hdr_->content_off);
    504     auto it = cs->files_.begin();
    505     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->ncontent; i++) {
    506         buffer b;
    507         p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(chdr->file_off);
    508         b.data = p_;
    509         while (p_ < ptr<uint8_t>(chdr->file_off + chdr->size)) {
    510             (*it)->content = new(p_) file_contents;
    511             p_ = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>((*it)->content->end());
    512             ++it;
    513         }
    514         b.end = p_;
    515         content_chunks_.push_back(b);
    516         ++chdr;
    517     }
    518     assert(it == cs->files_.end());
    519 
    520     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->filedata_off);
    521     cs->filename_data_.reserve(hdr_->nfiledata);
    522     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->nfiledata; i++) {
    523         cs->filename_data_.push_back(*consume<unsigned char>());
    524     }
    525 
    526     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->filesuffixes_off);
    527     cs->filename_suffixes_.reserve(hdr_->nfiledata);
    528     for (int i = 0; i < hdr_->nfiledata; i++) {
    529         cs->filename_suffixes_.push_back(load_int32());
    530     }
    531 
    532     p_ = ptr<uint8_t>(hdr_->filepos_off);
    533     cs->filename_positions_.reserve(hdr_->nfiles);
    534     for (auto it = cs->files_.begin();
    535          it != cs->files_.end(); ++it) {
    536         int pos = *consume<int>();
    537         indexed_file *sf = it->get();
    538         cs->filename_positions_.push_back(make_pair(pos, sf));
    539     }
    540 
    541     struct stat st;
    542     assert(fstat(fd_, &st) == 0);
    543     cs->index_timestamp_ = st.st_mtime;
    544 
    545     cs->finalized_ = true;
    546 }
    547 
    548 void code_searcher::dump_index(const string &path) {
    549     codesearch_index idx(this, path);
    550     idx.dump();
    551 }
    552 
    553 void code_searcher::load_index(const string &path) {
    554     std::unique_ptr<load_allocator> alloc = std::make_unique<load_allocator>(this, path);
    555     set_alloc(move(alloc));
    556     dynamic_cast<load_allocator*>(alloc_.get())->load(this);
    557 }
